resource_dependency.projectDataSchema: Database table projects(project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(), updated_at TIMESTAMP)
resource_dependency.documentDataSchema: Database table documents(document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, project_id UUID REFERENCES projects(project_id), title TEXT NOT NULL, content TEXT, file_type TEXT CHECK(file_type IN ('html', 'template')), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(), updated_at TIMESTAMP)
resource_dependency.fileAssetDataSchema: Database table file_assets(asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, document_id UUID REFERENCES documents(document_id), filename TEXT NOT NULL, url TEXT NOT NULL, mime_type TEXT, size INTEGER, uploaded_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW())

function: Provide a dual-mode HTML editor with live preview that supports switching between code and text editing modes.
static_description: The editor displays two main panels side-by-side. Left panel contains a tabbed interface with 'Code Editor' and 'Text Editor' tabs. Right panel shows live preview rendered in an iframe. Background color set to honeydew (#F0FFF0) and component borders/buttons in dark olive green (#556B2F). Toolbar includes buttons for mode switching, save, undo/redo actions.

interaction_and_states.description: Switching between 'Code Editor' and 'Text Editor' tabs changes the left panel content. Clicking 'Save' persists current content to backend API. Undo/redo buttons trigger respective editor actions.
Typing in either editor updates the live preview frame in real-time after a debounce delay of 500ms.

function: Implement syntax highlighting for HTML code editing mode using external libraries.
static_description: Code editor panel uses CodeMirror with Prism theme applied. Line numbers displayed on left margin. Text appears with colored tags, attributes, and values matching standard HTML syntax highlighting conventions.

interaction_and_states.description: As user types HTML code, syntax highlighting applies immediately with appropriate colors for elements, attributes, strings, and comments.
Editor scrolls vertically/horizontally while maintaining line number alignment.

function: Enable markdown-style text editing that automatically converts to semantic HTML markup.
static_description: Text editor resembles a clean writing surface with minimal styling. Toolbar above provides formatting options (bold, italic, headers). Help link opens modal explaining supported markdown syntax.

interaction_and_states.description: Markdown syntax (*italic*, **bold**) converts to corresponding HTML (<em>, <strong>) in real-time preview.
Formatting toolbar buttons wrap selected text in appropriate markdown symbols which then render as HTML in preview.

function: Manage organization of multiple HTML documents under named projects via hierarchical navigation.
static_description: Left sidebar shows collapsible tree view listing projects and their associated documents. New project/document creation forms appear in modals. Each item displays icon indicating type (folder/project, file/document).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking project/document items loads content into editor. Right-click reveals context menu with rename/delete options. '+' button creates new project or adds document to selected project.
Dragging documents between projects reassigns ownership in backend database.

resource_dependency.templateDataSchema: Database table templates(template_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT NOT NULL, html_content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW())

function: Allow users to save current document content as reusable templates and access saved templates.
static_description: Templates section accessible through dedicated button in toolbar or separate library view. Saved templates listed with thumbnails and titles. Preview available before applying to current document.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Save as Template' prompts naming dialog then stores current HTML to templates table. Selecting existing template inserts its content into active editor.

resource_dependency.helpModalContent:
## Getting Started
1. Create a Project
2. Add Documents
3. Edit Content
4. Save Templates

### Keyboard Shortcuts

function: Integrate basic user guide explaining core functionalities and keyboard shortcuts.
static_description: Help icon positioned top-right corner opens modal containing formatted guide text with headings, lists, and shortcut references. Guide organized into sections covering setup, usage, and troubleshooting.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking help icon toggles visibility of user guide modal overlay.

resource_dependency.touchSupportJS: /* Touch event handlers for mobile devices */

function: Ensure consistent experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile platforms.
static_description: Layout adjusts responsively with stacked panels on small screens and side-by-side on larger ones. Buttons sized appropriately for touch targets. Font scaling maintains readability on all devices.

interaction_and_states.description: Window resizing triggers layout adjustments - collapsing sidebars, stacking panels, adjusting font sizes.
Touch events handled gracefully with tap equivalents for click actions and swipe gestures for panel navigation where applicable.

function: Connect frontend components to RESTful backend services for managing dynamic data.
static_description: All CRUD operations for projects, documents, templates, and files routed through defined API endpoints. Requests include proper authentication headers and handle success/error responses.

interaction_and_states.description: Form submissions trigger async API calls with loading indicators during request lifecycle. Success displays confirmation; errors show user-friendly messages.

function: Establish secure connection to PostgreSQL instance using provided environment configuration.
static_description: Backend initializes pool connection to PostgreSQL server at startup using environment variables. Connection validated through health check query upon initialization.

interaction_and_states.description: Server bootstraps database connection and validates schema integrity. Failed connections prevent application launch with error logging.

resource_dependency.dataFetchingHooks: Custom React hooks abstracting fetch logic with loading/error states

function: Dynamically retrieve all application data exclusively through backend API requests.
static_description: Frontend never contains hardcoded sample data. All content loaded via authenticated HTTP(S) requests to backend endpoints. Loading placeholders shown until responses received.

interaction_and_states.description: Initial page load triggers fetch calls to populate projects, recent documents, and templates. Subsequent navigations update only relevant data segments.

function: Configure monorepo build system to install dependencies for both frontend and backend simultaneously.
static_description: Root package.json includes script entry 'install:all' executing shell command that sequentially runs npm install in client/ and server/ directories.

interaction_and_states.description: Running 'npm run install:all' from terminal executes dependency installations for both frontend and backend modules in parallel or sequence depending on implementation.

resource_dependency.concurrentDevScript: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
resource_dependency.devDependencies: concurrently package added to root devDependencies

function: Enable simultaneous development server execution for frontend and backend processes.
static_description: Root package.json defines 'dev' script launching both frontend (typically Vite/Webpack dev server) and backend (Node.js server) using concurrent process manager.

interaction_and_states.description: Executing 'npm run dev' spawns both servers in same terminal window with prefixed logs distinguishing source (FE/BE). Process termination stops both servers cleanly.

resource_dependency.themeTokens: CSS custom properties defining honeydew background and dark olive green accents used throughout app

function: Apply specified color scheme consistently across entire application interface.
static_description: Global CSS variables define honeydew background (#F0FFF0) and dark olive green components (#556B2F). Applied to base elements, buttons, inputs, and navigation bars uniformly.

interaction_and_states.description: All UI components inherit themed styles automatically without requiring manual class assignment. Theme remains consistent regardless of viewport size or device orientation.

function: Support uploading, storing, and retrieving image and asset files linked to documents.
static_description: Dedicated asset management area allows browsing previously uploaded files. Drag-and-drop zone accepts multiple file types. Uploaded files stored securely with unique identifiers and metadata tracking.

interaction_and_states.description: Dragging files onto dropzone initiates upload sequence showing progress bar per file. Successful uploads display thumbnail previews and insertable links/code snippets.
Clicking uploaded assets copies embed code/link to clipboard. Delete option removes file from storage and database references.

resource_dependency.sessionPersistenceLogic: JavaScript module handling automatic saving/restoring of editor/project states

function: Persist temporary working state locally to reduce reliance on backend roundtrips.
static_description: Browser localStorage retains information about last opened project, recently edited documents, draft changes, and favorite templates. Data encrypted minimally if sensitive.

interaction_and_states.description: Before closing tab/window, current state serialized and saved to localStorage. Next visit restores previous session automatically unless explicitly cleared.
Hard refresh preserves critical session data but clears transient UI states like selection ranges or scroll positions.
